title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message:
Hello, I have an A1466 that had water damage - cleaned it out and everythings good - comes on normally.  After 30 - 45 seconds complete freezes and have to force shut down.

Tried recovery mode, alternate OS, etc all same so it points to hardware.

What would main causes of this be , so I know where to begin troubleshooting?

Thanks! :)

title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message:
Seems that it still has crap somewhere, maybe under some BGA chips...
Did you pass it through UC?

title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message:
Negative, I am still looking to order a proper ultrasonic for mac boards. Just have one for cell phone boards at the moment.

What is the go to model for ultrasonic cleaning on mac boards?

title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message:

What is the go to model for ultrasonic cleaning on mac boards?[/QUOTE] [h=1]Should I grab the : Crest Powersonic P500H-45 ultrasonic cleaner w/ mesh basket 1.5 gallon ?[/h]

title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message: Be aware to get one with sweep function...

title: A1466 Water Damage - General Troubleshooting Question
message: Probably crap under the SMC. But this all depends on where the original damage was. Could be anything really.
